entry.title: Quant Trading Using Python by Jinhyeok Jeong
entry.summary:
Description

I would like to introduce the Python libraries and practical know-how I have used while working as a quant trading expert in the industry for over 10 years.

Jeong Jin-hyeok A quant trading expert who has worked as a Portfolio Manager and trader for over 10 years at quant â€¦
entry.content:
Description

I would like to introduce the Python libraries and practical know-how I have used while working as a quant trading expert in the industry for over 10 years.

Jeong Jin-hyeok A quant trading expert who has worked as a Portfolio Manager and trader for over 10 years at quant trading companies such as Millennium Capital Management, WorldQuant, and Presto Labs.
